name: Mohamed Haouel
description: IT Senior Project Manager chez Sagemcom Tunisie
about: Mohamed Haouel is a senior Project manager with 15 years in multinational environment (industry and NGO fields). He was graduated in 2005 as a Telecommunication Engineer from INSAT (Institut National des Sciences Appliquées et de Technologie). He was directly hired by Huawei where he get different missions: radio engineer, « broadband » engineer, core network engineer, project manager, team leader and sales manager. Those missions were between Tunisia, Senegal and Yemen. Finally he moved to “SAGEMCOM Tunisie” as IT Senior Project Manager in July 2019.

experience.location: Le Kram, Gouvernorat de Tunis, Tunisia

experience.description: - NGN engineer (SoftX3000, UMG8900, MRS6100, UMS, SE2300)

education.course_details: Ingénieur eb Réseaux Informatiques et Télécommunications
